name: sp-isc-devtools
description: Accelerate development of SailPoint ISC by providing tools for managing tenants, sources, transforms, and more. This is a fork of SailPoint Identity Security Cloud extension by Yannick Beot.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to ISC DevTools!
[üè† Open Home](command:sp-isc-devtools.open-home)
[‚ûï Add Tenant](command:sp-isc-devtools.add-tenant)

commands.title: Generate a digit token for password reset...
ISC: Enable logging for a source...
ISC: Upload this code to a rule...
ISC: Export the script from this rule...
ISC: Add a new access profile...
Export all Access Profiles as CSV...
Export all Access Profiles as CSV...

sp-isc-devtools.commit.enableStagingArea.description: Enable staging area for commits. When enabled, changes must be explicitly staged before committing.

sp-isc-devtools.cache.enabled.description: Enable local caching of entities for offline viewing and diff comparison.

sp-isc-devtools.git.autoSuggestSetup.description: Automatically suggest setting up version control for configurations.

sp-isc-devtools.treeView.hierarchicalMod.description: Use hierarchical tree view with grouped entities (Sources with nested APs, Rules, etc.)

sp-isc-devtools.search.recentSearchesLim.description: Maximum number of recent searches to remember.

sp-isc-devtools.rdk.path.description: Path to the SailPoint Rule Development Kit (RDK) directory.

sp-isc-devtools.rdk.autoDetect.description: Automatically detect and use RDK if installed.

sp-isc-devtools.beanshell.javaPath.description: Path to Java executable. Leave empty to auto-detect.

sp-isc-devtools.beanshell.timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for local BeanShell script execution.

scripts.esbuild-base: rimraf out && cd ./src/campaign-webview/app && npm run build && cd ../../.. && esbuild ./src/extension.ts --bundle --outfile=out/extension.js --external:vscode --format=cjs --platform=node
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
